summary: This is a forwarded email from July 9, 2019, notifying recipients about a telephone call received by CSOs (likely Court Security Officers or similar) from a female who identified herself and claimed to have information about Jeffrey Epstein. The email includes a return phone number.

events.title: Telephone call to CSOs about Epstein
events.description: Court Security Officers (CSOs) received a telephone call from a female who identified herself and claimed to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: On July 8, 2019, Court Security Officers (CSOs) received a phone call from a woman claiming to have information about Jeffrey Epstein.
The caller provided a return phone number, which is partially redacted in the document.
The information was forwarded via email on July 9, 2019, indicating an active flow of potential leads or witness information following Epstein's arrest.
